metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6617 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Skia, as used in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48Z and 6.0 before 2015-12-01,allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial ofservice (memory corruption) via a crafted media file, aka internal bug23648740.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
